refnamediv.refpurpose: perform JUnit tests on CDK classes

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cdk-test opens up a JUnit window for testing CDK classes. The optional argument is used to set the JUnit test that is loaded, e.g. org.openscience.cdk.test.CDKTests.
